title: Oilahuasca - Van Kush Original Research (2016)
author: marsresident / Van Kush Family
source: Steemit Original Post - 'The Future of Medicine and Psychedelics'
overview: Comprehensive CYP450 enzyme manipulation theory for activating kitchen spice allylbenzenes

shulgin_pihkal_connection.observation: Hidden in PIHKAL if read carefully

hidden_chapter.theory: Create molecules using your own liver by turning enzymes on and off
hidden_chapter.spice_cabinet: List of Phenethylamines from kitchen spices
hidden_chapter.key_insight: Just need to be Aminized - in liver or lab - to become active

oilahuasca_proven_discovery.mechanism: Pro-Drugs and CYP450 Enzymes (similar to MAOs/MAOIs)
oilahuasca_proven_discovery.comparison: Like Safrole from Sassafras → MDA/Ecstasy conversion

benzene_ring_positions.position_1_black: Allyl side chain - required for alkaloid conversion
benzene_ring_positions.position_2_brown: Methoxy group here → LSD-like mental effects
benzene_ring_positions.position_4_green: MUST be methoxy or methylenedioxy for psychedelic activity
benzene_ring_positions.critical_rule: Position 4 CANNOT be hydroxy (eugenol, chavicol) - only stimulant, not psychedelic

rare_unknown.sarisan: Positional isomer of myristicin - likely LSD-like
rare_unknown.gamma_asarone: Main active in Nepali calamus oil - LSD-like
rare_unknown.croweacin: Positional isomer of myristicin - probably speedy like apiole

critical_correction_alkaloid_formation.actual_science: They do NOT form amphetamines in vivo
critical_correction_alkaloid_formation.myristicin_limited: Only forms piperidines and pyrrolidines (no dimethylamines)
critical_correction_alkaloid_formation.propenylbenzenes: Asarone, anethole do NOT form alkaloid metabolites

sassafras_cinnamon_experiment.solution: Cinnamon bark oil is potent CYP2A6 inhibitor
sassafras_cinnamon_experiment.theory: 2-5g cinnamon or 5-10 drops cinnamon essential oil
sassafras_cinnamon_experiment.carcinogenicity_reduction: Inhibiting CYP2A6 also reduces carcinogenic metabolite

experiment_result.dose: 5g sassafras bark + lecithin + milk + 6 drops cinnamon + 3 drops chamomile
experiment_result.effects: NICE euphoria, enhanced touch, mildly psychedelic, no sedation

oilahuasca_procedure.step_2_activators: Anise Oil, B9 (Folate), or Valerian Root (Chinese)

step_3_enzyme_inhibitors.vanilla_cinnamon: Pick one or both (need Aldehyde structure)
step_3_enzyme_inhibitors.chamomile_options: German Chamomile, Cayenne, or Tangerine Skin
step_3_enzyme_inhibitors.additional: Almond extract, Anise, Lemon peel, Lime peel, or Nicotine
step_3_enzyme_inhibitors.cyp2c9: CBD, Echinacea Purpurea, Pomegranate, Pummelo, or Calamus
step_3_enzyme_inhibitors.cyp3a4: Clove oil, Catechin, Dill seed, or Goldenseal

methyl_chavicol.special_property: No tolerance - gets STRONGER with use

17bhsd2_critical_enzyme.role: Single most important enzyme to INDUCE (not inhibit)
17bhsd2_critical_enzyme.warning: If not functioning, allylbenzenes CANNOT produce psychedelic activity

phenylpropanoid_list.note: Cinnamon is Phenylpropanoid made from Phenylalanine
